seo-tools.description: Optional: Connect to an SEO API (Ahrefs, Semrush, DataForSEO) for advanced keyword research and competitor analysis. Commands fall back to WebSearch when no API is connected.
seo-tools._comment: Enable and configure this when you have an SEO tool API key. Example for DataForSEO: set command to your MCP server binary and provide DATAFORSEO_LOGIN and DATAFORSEO_PASSWORD in env.
